Title: Chungking Express
Description: Two love stories in Hong Kong, connected by a food stall and a shared sense of longing and fate.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre focused on character-driven stories with emotional themes.

Director.Name: Wong Kar-wai
Director.Bio: A Hong Kong filmmaker known for his visually stylish films, often focused on themes of love and loneliness.

Title: Dog Day Afternoon
Description: A bank robbery goes wrong, leading to a standoff with police and the media, based on a true story.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A genre that focuses on the lives of criminals and the investigation of crimes.

Director.Name: Sidney Lumet
Director.Bio: An American film director, widely recognized for his films addressing social issues.

Title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
Description: A beauty pageant in a small town becomes a deadly competition full of sabotage and dark humor.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: A genre aimed at entertaining and inducing laughter through exaggerated scenarios.

Director.Name: Martha Coolidge
Director.Bio: An American film director known for her work in comedy and drama.

Title: American Movie
Description: A documentary following the director of a low-budget horror film and his struggles to finish his passion project.

Genre.Name: Documentary
Genre.Description: A genre that presents factual stories and real-life subjects.

Director.Name: Chris Smith
Director.Bio: An American filmmaker and documentary director, known for his work in capturing offbeat stories.

Title: Dark City
Description: A man with no memory is caught in a mysterious city, plagued by strange experiments and altered realities.

Genre.Name: Sci-Fi
Genre.Description: A genre that deals with speculative concepts such as advanced science, technology, and futuristic societies.

Director.Name: Alex Proyas
Director.Bio: An Australian film director, producer, and screenwriter, known for his work in sci-fi and gothic films.

Title: Wild Strawberries
Description: An elderly professor reflects on his life during a journey through Sweden with his daughter-in-law.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre focused on character-driven stories with emotional themes.

Director.Name: Ingmar Bergman
Director.Bio: A Swedish film director, widely regarded as one of the greatest filmmakers of all time.

Title: The Lady Vanishes
Description: A young woman uncovers a conspiracy involving a missing elderly lady on a train traveling through Europe.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: A genre focused on excitement, suspense, and tension.

Director.Name: Alfred Hitchcock
Director.Bio: An English film director and producer, known as the 'Master of Suspense.'

Title: Saltburn
Description: A college student becomes obsessed with his wealthy classmate and infiltrates his familyâ€™s extravagant life.

Genre.Name: Dark Comedy
Genre.Description: A genre that combines humor with elements of tragedy, often in an exaggerated or absurd way.

Director.Name: Emerald Fennell
Director.Bio: A British film director, screenwriter, and actress, known for her work on darkly comedic films.

Title: Night of the Hunter
Description: A sinister preacher pursues two children who know the location of a hidden fortune in cash.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: A genre focused on excitement, suspense, and tension.

Director.Name: Charles Laughton
Director.Bio: An English actor and director, known for his only film as a director, the 1955 thriller 'Night of the Hunter.'

Title: Band of Outsiders
Description: Three friends plan a robbery, but things spiral out of control as emotions get in the way.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A genre that focuses on the lives of criminals and the investigation of crimes.

Director.Name: Jean-Luc Godard
Director.Bio: A French-Swiss film director and a leading figure in the French New Wave cinema.
